ch.unibe.iam.util
Class FibonacciHeap.Node

java.lang.Object
  ch.unibe.iam.util.FibonacciHeap.Node
Enclosing class:
FibonacciHeap
public static class FibonacciHeap.Node
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a node of the Fibonacci heap. It holds the information necessary for maintaining the structure of the heap. It also holds the reference to the data element and key value (which is used to determine the heap structure).

Author:
Nathan Fiedler

Constructor Detail

FibonacciHeap.Node

public FibonacciHeap.Node(java.lang.Object data,
                          double key)
Two-arg constructor which sets the data and key fields to the passed arguments. It also initializes the right and left pointers, making this a circular doubly-linked list.

Parameters:
data - data object to associate with this node
key - key value for this data object
Method Detail

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Return the string representation of this object. It simply returns the string representation of the data object. It is up to the data object to implement toString() properly.

Returns:
string representing this object
